uiDefinition.description: Enter your PDF Blocks API key. You can get a free trial API key in https://www.pdfblocks.com/power-automate/try-free
Enter your PDF Blocks server hostname. Leave it blank to use the default server (api.pdfblocks.com)

properties.description: PDF Blocks is a secure, reliable, and fast service to work with PDF documents in your flow. Actions include: Merge PDF documents, add or remove passwords, watermark documents, remove, extract, reverse, and rotate pages, and more. Check https://www.pdfblocks.com/power-automate for documentation, examples, and tutorials. Users can choose to process their PDF documents in US or European servers to comply with data location requirements.
